LIBRARY_DESCRIPTOR.LIBRARY_CONSTRUCTION_PROTOCOL: Fresh tumors were minced and enzymatically dissociated using the Human Tumor Dissociation Kit (Miltenyi Biotec) using a GentleMACS Octo Dissociator with heaters (Miltenyi Biotec) following the manufacturer's instructions. Libraries were constructed using the Chromium 3' Gene Expression Solution v3.1 (10x Genomics) per the manufacturer's instructions.

SUBMISSION.center_name: Moding Lab, Radiation Oncology, Stanford University School of Medicine

SUBMITTER_ID.namespace: Moding Lab, Radiation Oncology, Stanford University School of Medicine

Organization.Name: Moding Lab, Radiation Oncology, Stanford University School of Medicine

DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Single cell RNA-sequencing of undifferentiated pleomorphic sarcomas and leiomyosarcomas.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: The tumor microenvironment plays a crucial role in soft tissue sarcoma development and response to therapy. We used single cell RNA sequencing to analyze the malignant, immune, and other stromal cells present within soft tissue sarcomas. Overall design: Single cell RNA-sequencing was performed on 7 soft tissue sarcomas from 6 patients. [UPDATE] 05-31-2024: For GSM6534011 and GSM6534013, the titles were swapped and the processed data files were renamed accordingly. The file associations did not change.

LIBRARY_DESCRIPTOR.LIBRARY_CONSTRUCTION_PROTOCOL: Fresh tumors were minced and enzymatically dissociated using the Human Tumor Dissociation Kit (Miltenyi Biotec) using a GentleMACS Octo Dissociator with heaters (Miltenyi Biotec) following the manufacturer's instructions. Libraries were constructed using the Chromium 3' Gene Expression Solution v3.1 (10x Genomics) per the manufacturer's instructions.
